attributes.action: Strip the Peerages of certain members of the House of Lords, who have abused the public trust through milking  the Overnight Allowances
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Specifically:
Baroness Uddin,
Lord Brooke of Alverthorpe,
Lord Rosser,
Baroness Neuberger,
Baroness Goudi of Roundwood,
Lord Paul,
Lord Sheldon,
Lord Bhatia,
Lord Clarke of Hampstead,
Viscount Falkland,
Lord Taylor of Warwick.

We petition that the Prime Minsiter (be that Mr Brown or his successor) sanctions these members and strips them of their peerages.  In our opinion these Peers do not reflect the wisdon, morals or trust implied in the titles inferred upon them.
